General.Text: An individual is suspected to be carrying a firearm. Make contact with them.
Press {0} to stop and speak with the Suspect.
There is no more dialogue with the ~r~Suspect~w~.

Conversation.Dialogue: ~b~You:~w~ Hello, is it okay if we talk for a moment?
~r~Suspect:~w~ No, who are you?! What do you want!
~b~You:~w~ I just want to chat. I think you might have a weapon on you.
~r~Suspect:~w~ That's not true! You have the wrong person.
~b~You:~w~ Please cooperate with us so we can sort things out.

Surrender.Dialogue: ~r~Suspect:~w~ Okay, I'm sorry...what do I need to do?
~b~You:~w~ Please can you put your hands in the air so I can arrest you.
